General.Name: MC Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: MC Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and retails apparel, accessories, and lifestyle products in Thailand. It offers ready-to-wear clothing and apparels, as well as bags, belts, and activewears. The company markets its products under the Mc, Mc Lady, Mc Mini, The Blue Brothers, McT, U-P, and M&C brands. It also offers skincare and aromatic products; and inventory management services for online and other businesses. In addition, the company manages PCs and warehouse employees; and distributes products and services through online/internet channel, as well as manages trade and products. As of June 30, 2022, it operated a network of 638 points of sales in Thailand, as well as 9 points of sales internationally. The company also offers its products online through mcshop.com. MC Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 111 West Third Street, Madison, NE, United States, 68748
